name: SpreadYourWings.co
slogan: Broaden your horizons. Gain new perspective. Find inspiration on a Spreadyourwings tour
description: Students and young professionals *across the globe* have the choice to go on tours running all year-long, themed across popular industry verticals. Business Entrepreneurship & Financial Services, Engineering (Mech, Arch, Civ, Aero) & Design, Tourism & Hospitality. More info coming soon.

jobs.title: UK Sales Associate (Internship)
jobs.description:
Junior Sales Associate UK.

Spread Your Wings offers bespoke educational experiences in Dubai for success-driven students and aspiring professionals. Our interactive workshops combine exclusive industry insights, behind the scenes exposure and unique networking & employment opportunities.

SYW Mission 

Our aim is to create dynamic learning experiences which foster lasting human connections, focus on greater lateral thinking and promote superior workplace performance.

SYW Vision 

We seek to become the leading, accredited programme provider for employ-ability skills and industry leading workplace practices. Creating an elite portfolio of speakers, trainers and coaches that inspire while also imparting exclusive knowledge and insights. 

UK Sales Associate Role:

Ideally with commercially oriented / business related degree. 
Interested in Tourism sector
Interested in Education sector
Understand our product

_________________________________________________

In charge of generating demand at UOL universities 
Assist BDM in accreditation related activities.
Report to Business Development Manager UK 
Hit 30 X students per month for various tour dates.
Find yourself a student ambassador (we can help in the search) to assist in sales process (on a purely commission basis)
Responsible for reporting on weekly progress of both self and employed ambassador. 
Being available for on campus events and giving presentations at the schools. 

£500 monthly base salary
Commission is £20.00 per student after the 10th sale.

Output matters more than hours worked.
Contact +447833228893 for information
